type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Cleric Noble
rules_text:
Lifelink, reach
[i]Priestess[/i] – Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.
[i]Sky's Limits[/i] – Whenever you sacrifice an enchantment, Sakura, Skyward Priestess deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {R}{W}
